# Copilot Instructions for sztylc-sons-app

## Project Overview
This is the SZTYLC & Sons application repository.

## Coding Standards

### General Guidelines
- Write clear, maintainable, and well-documented code
- Follow industry best practices for the technologies used
- Ensure code is properly tested before committing
- Keep commits focused and atomic

### Code Quality
- Maintain consistent code formatting
- Write descriptive variable and function names
- Add comments for complex logic
- Avoid code duplication

### Version Control
- Write clear and descriptive commit messages
- Keep pull requests focused on a single feature or fix
- Ensure all tests pass before merging

## Development Workflow
1. Create a feature branch from the main branch
2. Make your changes with clear, incremental commits
3. Test your changes thoroughly
4. Submit a pull request with a clear description
5. Address review feedback promptly

## Security
- Never commit sensitive information (API keys, passwords, etc.)
- Follow security best practices for the technology stack
- Keep dependencies up to date
- Review security advisories regularly
